item.title: By: Ed Brill
item.dc:creator: Ed Brill
item.description: <p>IIRC, you were in Orlando for Lotusphere 2003. Are you attending LS04, and if so, are you in Orlando a full month ahead of time? Hadn't checked your blog in a while, sorry.... appreciate your occasional links to me (even if they are to make fun of my lack of awareness of the English flag ;)).</p>
item.content:encoded: IIRC, you were in Orlando for Lotusphere 2003. Are you attending LS04, and if so, are you in Orlando a full month ahead of time? Hadn’t checked your blog in a while, sorry…. appreciate your occasional links to me (even if they are to make fun of my lack of awareness of the English flag ;)).

item.title: By: mum
item.dc:creator: mum
item.description: <p>Hi nice to hear from you we were at a Christmas concert in Northampton today. What's the temp like? Speak to you tomorrow.x</p>
item.content:encoded: Hi nice to hear from you we were at a Christmas concert in Northampton today. What’s the temp like? Speak to you tomorrow.x

item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description: <p>Well you probably heard the news here by now.. 2-0 to them... don't even bring myself to say those fateful words being that team north of the border!</p>
item.content:encoded: Well you probably heard the news here by now.. 2-0 to them… don’t even bring myself to say those fateful words being that team north of the border!
